snippet: Ruth’s Chris Steak House is using advertising and the promotion of a speaker series for entrepreneurs to attract more women to its steakhouses.
abstract: Advertising column says Ruth’s Chris Steak House is using advertising and the promotion of a speaker series for entrepreneurs to attract more women to its steakhouses.

headline.seo: Business-Themed Ads Help Ruth’s Chris Lure Women
